about_the_game:
Maya: Cats of Istanbul is a game I developed inspired by my love for cats and the enchanting atmosphere of Istanbul. As someone living in Istanbul, creating a game about Istanbul’s cats is a source of pride. Also, the name Maya belongs to my cat :)

A portion of the game’s revenue will be used to support feeding, shelter, and healthcare expenses for stray animals. I will transparently share this process with our Steam community and on our social media accounts.

What is Maya: Cats of Istanbul?

Legend has it that cats were cherished residents of the Ottoman palaces. Over time, they spread throughout Istanbul, becoming invaluable allies in the fight against rats and winning the hearts of the city’s people.

Maya: Cats of Istanbul is a hidden object game where you need to find adorable cats hidden in the streets and historical landmarks of Istanbul. As you search for the cats cleverly tucked into intricate details, you will explore Istanbul’s iconic architecture and lose yourself in its detailed models. You will even come across famous Istanbul cats like Gli and Tombili in the game :)

Rotate the entire city,

Check every tree,

Open every trash box

Search everywhere—race against time to achieve success, or play at without any time limits.

Game Maps

The game consists of different levels featuring Istanbul’s iconic locations:

Galata Tower

Hagia Sophia

Topkapi Palace

If there’s enough demand from players, an additional bonus level featuring Cappadocia, outside of Istanbul, will be added to the game!

I hope you have fun in advance :)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any OS with x11 support
  • Processor: 1.3GHz or more, 64-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina, Mojave, High Sierra, Sierra, OSX El Capitan, Yosemite
  • Processor: Dual core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2012 Mac
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Maya: Cats of Istanbul

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 / AMD Phenom II X4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / AMD Radeon R9 350
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit işlemci ve işletim sistemi gerektirir
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A captivating hidden object game set in the cat capital of the world: Istanbul! Explore detailed 3D dioramas of Istanbul's historic and iconic landmarks, and find the adorable cats hidden within them. But the real question is: Can you find them all?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish
